strapiPost.title: U of A Hosts Traveling Exhibit From U.S. Holocaust Memorial Museum
strapiPost.content:
Americans and the Holocaust, a traveling exhibition from the U.S. Holocaust Memorial Museum, will be on display at Mullins Library on the U of A campus until Dec 8. 

  • Observing the past: The exhibit examines Americaâ€™s responses to Nazism, the war, and the genocide that took place in Europe during the 1930s and 1940s.
  • Interpreting the past: Taking visitors on a journey into the past, the memorial poses two primary questions: What did Americans know, and what more could have been done?

Learn more about the exhibit HERE.
